wikipedia_page.main: Bill Lucas (born 13 September 1987 in Exeter) is a British rower. He competed with Sam Townsend in the double sculls at the 2012 Summer Olympics and finished fifth. He attended Towerhouse School for primary school education and Torquay Boys Grammar school for secondary education.

response: William Lucas or Bill Lucas may refer to:
*William Lucas (Virginia politician) (1800–1877), politician and lawyer from Virginia
*William Lucas (actor) (1925–2016), British film and television actor
*William Lucas (Michigan politician) (born 1928), Wayne County executive and 1986 Michigan gubernatorial candidate
